product_description: Legendary racing precision meets LEGO building mastery with the LEGO Speed Champions Porsche 911 GT3 RS Super Car (77239) building set. This model car replica for fans ages 9 years old and up captures the distinctive design elements that make the GT3 RS a track legend and represents the latest model in one of the most iconic series of sports cars. Every authentic detail of this super car has been carefully recreated, from the famous rear wing and air intake features on the hood to the distinctive headlights and novelty rims that define this Porsche masterpiece's iconic silhouette. Young builders can place the included driver minifigure—complete with helmet and red Porsche Track Day Experience outfit—behind the wheel to stage high-speed, pretend play racing adventures on both street and track. When race-time is done, the completed car model can be proudly displayed on a shelf or bedside table as eye-catching room decor and a premium tribute to automotive excellence. This exciting building toy perfectly combines hands-on construction fun with authentic details for an experience that kids and adult car-model collectors alike will appreciate. Makes an awesome birthday gift for boys and girls who love sports cars, building toys, or the world of high-performance racing. For an enhanced building experience, other LEGO Speed Champions car playsets (each set sold separately) can expand the racing garage, while the LEGO Builder app provides digital guidance and 3D viewing tools.
